thread.title: Fifty Shades star Dakota Johnson praises 'dream partner' Jamie Dornan | Metro News
thread.title_full: Fifty Shades star Dakota Johnson praises 'dream partner' Jamie Dornan | Metro News

author: Jessica Walford For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Fifty Shades star Dakota Johnson praises 'dream partner' Jamie Dornan | Metro News
text:
Jessica Walford for Metro.co.uk Monday 27 Feb 2017 10:15 pm Dakota Johnson said co-star Jamie Dornan was her ‘ideal partner’ (Picture: Barcroft)

Things certainly are steamy on screen for Fifty Shades filmstars Jamie Dornan and Dakota Johnson – but it sounds like they’re pretty close off screen too after Dakota called Jamie was her ‘ideal partner’? M. Night Shyamalan had the best response to THAT mix-up at the Oscars Get your minds out of the gutter straight away. First off, (unfortunately) Jamie is married to Amelia Warner and the couple have two daughters together. Secondly, Fifty Shades isn’t real. Sorry to crush all your dreams. But Dakota did open up about her relationship with her co-star Jamie, saying he made her feel comfortable in some of those saucy sex scenes. The pair get a bit saucy in the Fifty Shades series (Picture: Universal Pictures) She told OK! Magazine: ‘It’s genuinely one of the fastest, closest friendships I’ve ever made in my life, just based on the amount of time we’ve actually known each other. ‘I love Jamie, I trust him and I really couldn’t tell you if I could have done this without him.’
